name: file-cutter
title: File Cutter
description: Cut and paste files in Finder
author: rokartur

commands.name: cut-files
commands.title: Cut files
commands.subtitle: Cut selected files in Finder
commands.description: Cuts the selected files in Finder and stores them in the clipboard

commands.name: paste-files
commands.title: Paste files
commands.subtitle: Paste files from clipboard in Finder
commands.description: Pastes the files from the clipboard into the current Finder window
